title: Extended Classic: StarTalk Live! Satisfying Our Curiosity about Mars (Part 1)
description: In honor of the 4th anniversary of Curiosity landing on Mars, we’re revisiting our StarTalk Live! show where we descended on The Bell House to celebrate the momentous event, with Neil Tyson, Sarah Silverman, Jim Gaffigan, Eugene Mirman and astrobiologist David Grinspoon. NEW: Extended with David and Chuck Nice discussing the Anthropocene epoch.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)

NEW: Extended with David and Chuck Nice discussing the Anthropocene epoch.
